comment.author: 26881258@N07
comment._content: I could not believe that the movie had this title. When I searched it down it was a 1928 movie with the title Lilac Time starring Gary Cooper and Colleen More. Long since forgotten. It was a black and white silent movie. It had probably some interesting WW1 shots with these modified Waco 9 biplanes www.imdb.com/title/tt0019098/
